name: PJSC Myronivsky Hliboproduct
goal: MHP holds an indisputable leading position in the Ukrainian meat market. Strong growth across all business streams is our strategic goal. We are dynamic and fast-growing Ukrainian company, based on the unique model of vertical integration. We are leaders of the agrarian market in poultry segment and are constantly increasing poultry production capacity in Ukraine. Our enterprises are built and equipped with cutting edge technologies and our employees have the unique knowledge and experience in the industry. The basis of our success is our workers, investment, business model, management skills and leading technologies.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Customs, Enlargement, Environment, Food Safety, Trade
euInitiatives: MHP exports poultry products to the EU. It is interested in the EU’s trade and neighborhood policies. It is also interested in the EU’s food safety regime.
